Package team17cng457.webservice.Service

Class DeviceServiceTest

java.lang.Object
team17cng457.webservice.Service.DeviceService
team17cng457.webservice.Service.DeviceServiceTest
@ActiveProfiles("test") @SpringBootTest class DeviceServiceTest extends DeviceService
Test class for testing Device Controller Uses the application-test.properties file for staging environment. DOES NOT work on the production data
